comments.body:
Checking that the AppBar's shape parameter correctly initializes its shape property is useful, however you should also verify that the the AppBar Material widget's shape property is set.

You may find https://docs.flutter.io/flutter/flutter_test/CommonFinders/descendant.html to be useful for this.

Please add a comment above this line:
```
// This is a regression test for https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/58665
```
Could you add a similar test for the default value for `SliverAppBar`? Thanks!
There should probably be a test for the regular `AppBar` as well when using it with a Scaffold
